TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Activity`1<TResult> extends System.Activities.ActivityWithResult
Public MustInherit Class Activity(Of TResult) Inherits ActivityWithResult
generic <typename TResult> public ref class Activity abstract : System::Activities::ActivityWithResult

Docs.typeparam: The type of the return value of the activity.
Docs.summary: An abstract base class used to create composite activities from pre-existing objects, which specifies a result type using the activity's type specifier.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Activities.Activity%601> is the base class in the activity type hierarchy. All other activity types with generic type definitions such as <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601>, <xref:System.Activities.NativeActivity%601>, <xref:System.Activities.AsyncCodeActivity%601>, and <xref:System.Activities.DynamicActivity%601> derive from this class.
## Examples The following example shows how to derive a class from <xref:System.Activities.Activity%601>.
[!code-csharp[HelloWorld#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/helloworld/cs/appendstring.cs#0)]
